data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The CGI::Session::Enhanced_MySQL module/driver for CGI::Session was
    created after I noticed that myself and others had issues using the
    standard CGI::Session::MySQL driver on message boards and posts
    throughout news groups. The naming convention of the namespace is
    part of the standard detailed in the CGI::Session driver creation
    information. I belive that this module deserves to be part of this
    namespace.

    Thanks! --Noel
